intro: Sisymbrium cheiranthus, commonly known as the yellow rocket, is a flowering plant in the Brassicaceae family. It is characterized by its bright yellow flowers and lobed leaves, which are typical of the mustard family. Native to Europe, it is often found in disturbed soils and along roadsides. The plant produces small, elongated pods that contain several seeds. It is valued in horticulture for its ornamental appeal and is also used in traditional herbal medicine.
